original_response.completion: Barack Obama was the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. He was the first African-American to hold the presidency. Prior to becoming president, Obama was a U.S. senator from Illinois from 2005 to 2008 and an Illinois state senator from 1997 to 2004. He is a member of the Democratic Party.

standardized_response.result: Barack Obama was the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. He was the first African-American to hold the presidency. Prior to becoming president, Obama was a U.S. senator from Illinois from 2005 to 2008 and an Illinois state senator from 1997 to 2004. He is a member of the Democratic Party.
